sources.description: Darwin's theory of evolution divides the citizens of a village in the southern United States. Courtroom drama by Stanley Kramer starring Spencer Tracy.

metadata.Plot: Teacher B.T. Cates is arrested for teaching Darwin's theories. Famous lawyer Henry Drummond defends him; fundamentalist politician Matthew Brady prosecutes. This is a very thinly disguised rendition of the 1925 "Scopes monkey trial" with debates between Clarence Darrow and William Jennings Bryan taken largely from the transcripts.
metadata.Writer: Nedrick Young, Harold Jacob Smith, Jerome Lawrence
metadata.Actors: Spencer Tracy, Fredric March, Gene Kelly
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. 3 wins & 11 nominations total
